about.description: Since 2017, we've been providing reliable logistics solutions across ocean, air, road and rail with a focus on visibility, speed and cost-efficiency. Our team combines global reach with local expertise to keep your cargo moving.
about.trackDescription: Stay updated from pickup to delivery with real-time tracking

aboutPage.heroSubtitle: Your Trusted Global Logistics Partner Since 2017
aboutPage.storyText: Founded in 2017 in Istanbul, DVN LOG has grown from a local freight forwarder to a comprehensive global logistics provider. Our journey has been marked by continuous innovation, strategic partnerships, and an unwavering commitment to customer satisfaction.
aboutPage.missionText: To provide seamless, reliable, and cost-effective logistics solutions that empower businesses to reach global markets with confidence.
aboutPage.visionText: To be the most trusted logistics partner for businesses worldwide, known for our innovation, reliability, and exceptional customer service.
